entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Gull Bay

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
